SYSTEM: Wiki: Slides:
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/531378/pachube2rdf/Pachube2RDF.ppt
HLAPI stream database mode (MySQL + MysqlProxy + 4Store)
database schema for pachube sensor result :
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/531378/pachube2rdf/er.jpg
D2R mappings between pachube sensor schema to SSN ontology :
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/531378/pachube2rdf/pachube2rdf.n3
URL :
http://denebola.dia.fi.upm.es:2020/
SPARQL

SPARQL Endpoint :
http://denebola.dia.fi.upm.es:2020/snorql/
Get all sensors measuring temperature

SELECT DISTINCT * WHERE {
  ?s a <http://purl.oclc.org/NET/ssnx/ssn#Sensor>.
  ?s <http://purl.oclc.org/NET/ssnx/ssn#observes> ?property.
   ?property <http://xmlns.com/foaf/spec/homepage> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Temperature>.
}
speaker: SYSTEM
